titre: Triomphe de Tibère sur les Germains et les Pannoniens
description_detaillee: À son retour à Rome, Tibère célèbre un triomphe magnifique pour ses victoires en Pannonie et en Germanie. Cet événement renforce sa position de successeur d'Auguste.
prompt_flux: Masterpiece, ultra-realistic documentary photography of a Roman triumph. General Tiberius on a ceremonial chariot, wearing a purple toga and laurel crown. Roman soldiers march in formation carrying only metal Eagle Aquilae standards. Captured Germanic prisoners in chains. Background shows the Roman Forum with accurate marble architecture. Museum-quality historical accuracy.

pays: Au cours de sa campagne en Germanie, le général romain Germanicus capture Thusnelda, l'épouse du chef germain Arminius. Cet acte symbolise un succès romain après le désastre de Teutobourg.
column20: Masterpiece, ultra-realistic documentary photography of a dramatic capture scene. In a dense Germanic forest, Roman soldiers in authentic armor are restraining the defiant Germanic noblewoman Thusnelda. General Germanicus observes. Tense atmosphere. Shields are decorated with non-linguistic patterns like wings or lightning bolts. Museum-quality historical accuracy.

description_detaillee: Germanicus célèbre un triomphe à Rome pour ses victoires en Germanie. Bien que l'empereur Tibère ait mis fin à sa campagne, ce triomphe accroît son immense popularité.
prompt_flux: Masterpiece, ultra-realistic documentary photography of a Roman triumph. The popular general Germanicus on a ceremonial chariot, wearing a purple toga picta. Procession includes captured Germanic treasures and prisoners. Background is the Roman Forum. Roman soldiers carry ONLY metal Eagle Aquilae as standards. Scutum shields have abstract patterns. Museum-quality historical accuracy.

description_detaillee: Germanicus, neveu et fils adoptif de Tibère, meurt subitement à Antioche. Sa mort, soupçonnée d'être un empoisonnement commandité, provoque une vive émotion à Rome et déstabilise la succession impériale.
prompt_flux: Masterpiece, ultra-realistic documentary photography of a solemn deathbed scene. In a luxurious Roman villa in Antioch, Germanicus lies pale on his bed, surrounded by his grieving wife Agrippina the Elder and his children. Walls are decorated with pictorial frescoes and mosaics ONLY. Heavy atmosphere of tragedy. Authentic Roman-Hellenistic interior design. Museum-quality historical accuracy.

titre: Révolte de Sacrovir et Florus en Gaule
description_detaillee: Les chefs gaulois Julius Florus et Julius Sacrovir mènent une révolte contre l'administration romaine, principalement en raison du poids des impôts. La rébellion est rapidement écrasée par les légions.
prompt_flux: Masterpiece, ultra-realistic documentary photography of an armed rebellion. A chaotic battle between Gallic warriors and Roman legionaries in a forest clearing. Gallic rebels wield long swords and painted wooden shields. Roman soldiers form a disciplined shield wall (testudo), equipped with gladii and large rectangular scuta. Shields have only pictorial designs. Roman legionaries carry only metal eagle aquilae. Museum-quality historical accuracy.

description_detaillee: L'empereur Tibère quitte Rome et se retire de manière permanente sur l'île de Capri, laissant la gestion de l'Empire à son préfet du prétoire, Séjan. Ce retrait marque le début d'une période de pouvoir accru pour Séjan.
prompt_flux: Masterpiece, ultra-realistic documentary photography of a departure scene. The aging Emperor Tiberius, in a simple toga, walks along a marble pier towards a waiting Roman ship. The island of Capri is visible across the sea. The Roman ship has plain linen sails and a wooden mast. The scene conveys a sense of quiet withdrawal from power. The ship and pier are unadorned. Museum-quality historical accuracy.

description_detaillee: Les Frisons, une tribu germanique, se révoltent contre la domination romaine en raison de l'oppression fiscale. Ils remportent une victoire significative à la bataille de la forêt de Baduhenna, assurant leur indépendance pour plusieurs décennies.
prompt_flux: Masterpiece, ultra-realistic documentary photography of an ambush in the Baduhenna Forest. Germanic Frisian warriors attack a column of Roman legionaries in a swamp. Fierce and chaotic combat. The Roman soldiers carry ONLY metal Eagle Aquilae. Frisian warriors' shields have simple geometric or animal paintings. The image focuses on action and the natural environment. Museum-quality historical accuracy.
